text:
For many years, a new technology appears in our life. This technology is facial recognition. This technology consist to use facial features.
With this technology everybody can be recognized easily. This technological advance revolutionize our pratice. Actually, facial recognition is present everyday in our lives. For exemple, we can use it to use our credit cart. In other areas this technology is used différently. In the field of justice, we can see, this is use to recognize criminals from their traits. It's in this logic, that we can see the impact of the use of this facial technology in our daily lives. Moreover in the field of information and communication this technology is important because she asks some social question like freedom or surveillance.
 This technology impact our lives. As I say before she aks some question about the surveillance or the liberty. Indeed,whit this technology we can feel observed, or controlled. It is one of the moste important critic that is said about this technology. Morover, this controversy animates a debate on the society. And différents actors are involved like lawyers, researchers, and of cours the citizens. This technology also raises the questionof data protection. With this question we can say this technology revolutionize our pratices et our lives. And with that we can say facial recognition impact our lives.
